FulfillmentLineSourceRel.name: FulfillmentLineSourceRel
FulfillmentLineSourceRel.description: Represents the relationship between a fulfillment order line and its decomposition source.

FulfilmentOrderLineId.description: The ID of the fulfillment order line.

Name.description: The relation between the two order line sources.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the relationship record.

SourceItemIdentifier.description: The ID of the decomposition source that's related to the fulfilment order line. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later.

SourceLineItemId.description: The ID of the source line item.

SourceType.description: The type of source for the line item.

SupplementalAction.description: The supplemental action that's applied to the line item based on the run-time changes made to the original fulfillment request. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.
